subject: Shipping
description_text:
Hello,

I’m interested in your sim racing products, but I can’t select Poland as a
shipping destination on your website.

Do you offer shipping to Poland, or is there another way to place an order?

Thank you,
Mailo Pikuła

conversations.body_text: Hi Mailo Pikuła,  Customers in Poland can place orders directly through our Polish distributor, and the products will be shipped locally from Poland  https:/fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product_brand=Simsonn
